title: Flaw in Huawei AppGallery allows paid Android apps to be downloaded for free [Update: Fix incoming]
content:
A newly discovered flaw in Huawei’s AppGallery store makes it possible for paid Android apps to be downloaded for free, but a fix is on the way.

more…

The post Flaw in Huawei AppGallery allows paid Android apps to be downloaded for free [Update: Fix incoming] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A newly discovered flaw in Huawei's AppGallery store makes it possible for paid Android apps to be downloaded for free.
